input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Powell Heavy Metal Pewter Full Over Full Bunk Bed

Item specifications:
Made to withstand the adventures and pressures of a youth environment
Crafted of pewter metal
Full bed over a full bed
Sturdy step ladder
Some assembly required
Two beds in the space for one


Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Heavy Metal Collection is made to withstand all of the adventures and pressures of a youth environment. Crafted of Pewter Metal, this piece easily complements the ever changing dcor of a childs room. Two beds in the space for one, this piece features a full size bed above a full size bed. A sturdy step ladder provides easy up and down access to the top bunk. Some assembly required.
input_text.Response B: Powell Heavy Metal Pewter Full Over Full Bunk Bed is a powerhouse of a bunk bed! Made from sturdy pewter metal, this bed will withstand even the most adventurous kids’ playtime. Featuring a full bed over a full bed, this bunk bed provides plenty of sleeping space for two. And with a sturdy step ladder, getting up to the top bunk is a breeze. Some assembly required, but once it's up, this bunk bed is ready for years of fun and adventure.

label_annotations.factors_a: Summary A has a lot of good information and is structured well.
label_annotations.factors_b: Summary B is a bit stronger with detail and persuasiveness.
label_annotations.feedback: Both responses are good, B has slightly more persuasive information.
